General Description
Conveniently located in the heart of Topeka's business, entertainment and shopping district, the cozy Homewood Suites by Hilton Topeka hotel is less than a mile from the interstate. With a wide variety of restaurants nearby - many within walking distance - and lots of leisure activities available within a short five minute drive, our extended-stay hotel is an ideal base in the center of Topeka, Kansas. A complimentary shuttle service within a five mile radius makes it easy to explore the area.Join us in the lodge each morning for a complimentary hot full breakfast, and unwind with friends old and new at the complimentary evening social*, Monday through Thursday. Stock up on snacks, chilled meals and toiletries in the 24-hour convenience mart, or take advantage of our complimentary grocery shopping service. Feel at home in a spacious studio, one- or two-bedroom suite, featuring separate living, working and sleeping areas. Enjoy amenities including complimentary WiFi and a fully-equipped kitchen.Discover fantastic leisure amenities at this extended-stay Topeka hotel. Plunge into the heated indoor swimming pool, soak in the hot tub, and energize in the 24-hour fitness center. Challenge a friend to a game of pool or foosball in our modern games room. Watch TV in the lodge, or relax on the outdoor patio, which features a fire pit and communal BBQ grills. The 333 sq. ft. conference room is ideal for meetings for up to 15 people.*Subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.
